article.name: Is it possible to monitor network devices?
article.title: Is it possible to monitor network devices?
article.body:
• Network devices can be monitored through use of the following monitoring plugins.
    • mackerel-plugin-snmp
      • Retrieve arbitrary MIB information with SNMP and post as a metric.
      • SNMP Trap monitoring is not supported.
    • check-ping
      • Check ICMP communication and have alerts issued when interrupted.
  • Plugins must be installed on and configured for a host installed with the mackerel-agent. For information on how to install and configure plugins, refer to the following documentation.
    • Using the official plugin pack to visualize middleware metrics - Mackerel Docs
    • Metric plugins - mackerel-plugin-snmp - Mackerel Docs
    • go-check-plugins/check-ping
